name: Search attempted having not logged in

testSteps.description: Given I have not logged into the API

When I locate a customer using the following criteria:
| phoneNumberPrefix | phoneNumber |
| 000 | 00000000 |

children.description: Locate by data: | phoneNumberPrefix | phoneNumber | | 000 | 00000000 |

testSteps.description: Then I should receive an Authorisation Error

userStory.storyName: Locate a customer by personal details and Reg Number
userStory.narrative:
In order to find information relevant to a specific customer,as an S&A working on a tablet, 
I want to be able to locate a customer by either: registration number, phone number, card number or
by a combination of name and date of birth.

title: Search attempted having not logged in

tags.name: Locate a customer by personal details and Reg Number
